95614.name: Share of drinkers who "binged" on heaviest day of drinking in last week
95614.datasetName: Drinking habits in Great Britain - UK ONS
95614.s_name: Drinking habits in Great Britain - UK ONS

source.name: Drinking habits in Great Britain - UK ONS
source.additionalInfo: "Binge" drinking is defined by the UK Government as a man consuming more than 8 units of alcohol in a single day, or 6 units of alcohol in a single day in the case of a woman.
